word: In some of our churches the work of organizing and of ordaining elders has been premature; the Bible rule has been disregarded, and consequently grievous trouble has been brought upon the church. There should not be so great haste in electing leaders as to ordain men who are in no way fitted for the responsible work\97men who need to be converted, elevated, ennobled, and refined before they can serve the cause of God in any capacity.  5T 617, 618446
